original: lha'i bsnyen pa la bsnyen thabs dang / brtag gnyis las /
analyzed: lha'i bsnyen pa la bsnyen thabs dang / brtag gnyis las /
translated: In the approximation of the deity, there is the method of approximation and the recitation of the mantra.

original: lha'i bsnyen pa'i thabs la rdzas kyis bsnyen pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags kyis bsnyen pa dang gsum mo //
analyzed: lha'i bsnyen pa'i thabs la rdzas kyis bsnyen pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags kyis bsnyen pa dang gsum mo //
translated: The means of propitiating the deities are threefold: propitiation by substances, by meditative concentration, and by mantras.

original: rdzas la mandal phul bas 'khor bas 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang / gtor mas chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas la mandal phul bas 'khor bas 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang / gtor mas chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
translated: Propitiation by substances is twofold: propitiation of the wheel by offering a mandala, and propitiation of the Dharma protectors by offering sacrificial cakes.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor bzhis 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang dgug gzhug bskyed pas chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor bzhis 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang dgug gzhug bskyed pas chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
translated: Propitiation by meditative concentration is twofold: propitiation of the wheel by means of the four yogas, and propitiation of the Dharma protectors by means of summoning, inducting, and generating.

original: sngags la gtso 'khor gnyis bsnyen pa dang / yi @148b ge brga mtshams sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: sngags la gtso 'khor gnyis bsnyen pa dang / yi @148b ge brga mtshams sbyar ba'o //
translated: Propitiation by mantras is twofold: propitiation of the principal deity and the retinue, and the joining of the syllables.

original: rtags la mngon sum dang / mtshan ma dang / grangs su bskyal pa'o //
analyzed: rtags la mngon sum dang / mtshan ma dang / grangs su bskyal pa'o //
translated: The signs are threefold: direct perception, indications, and counting.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bzhi ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bzhi ste /
translated: The ritual of the maṇḍala also has four parts:

original: dkyil 'khor rgyu'i bya ba dang / lhag gnas dang / dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo dang / cho ga dngos so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyu'i bya ba dang / lhag gnas dang / dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo dang / cho ga dngos so //
translated: the activities of the cause of the maṇḍala, the preparatory rite, the nature of the maṇḍala, and the actual ritual.

original: rgyu'i bya ba la bdun te /
analyzed: rgyu'i bya ba la bdun te /
translated: The activities of the cause are sevenfold:

original: sa btsal ba dang / brtag pa dang / bslang ba dang / gzung ba dang / gcad pa dang / sbyang ba dang / brtsig pa'o //
analyzed: sa btsal ba dang / brtag pa dang / bslang ba dang / gzung ba dang / gcad pa dang / sbyang ba dang / brtsig pa'o //
translated: The site is sought, examined, taken possession of, measured, divided, purified, and built upon.

original: lha gnas la bzhi ste /
analyzed: lha gnas la bzhi ste /
translated: The site of the deities is fourfold:

original: sa'i lha mo dang / 'khor lo dang / bum pa dang / slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i lha mo dang / 'khor lo dang / bum pa dang / slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
translated: the earth goddess, the wheel, the vase, and the consecration of the disciples.

original: ngo bo la thig gdab pa dang / tshon dgye ba dang / rgyan dgod pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo la thig gdab pa dang / tshon dgye ba dang / rgyan dgod pa'o //
translated: The essence is the layout of the grid, the application of colors, and the arrangement of ornaments.

original: sa btsal ba la ting nge 'dzin sogs kyis lus lha /
analyzed: sa btsal ba la ting nge 'dzin sogs kyis lus lha /
translated: In seeking the site, the body is the deity through samādhi and so on.🔽The speech is the recitation of the essence mantra, and the mind is the focus on benefiting migrating beings wherever one wishes.

original: yid gang 'dod kyi 'gro don la dmigs pa dang / ngag snying po'i sbyor ba dang / btsal ba dngos la las dang sbyar la phyogs btsal ba dang / rgyud ltar dben pa'am mi 'jigs pa'i sa btsal ba'o //
analyzed: yid gang 'dod kyi 'gro don la dmigs pa dang / ngag snying po'i sbyor ba dang / btsal ba dngos la las dang sbyar la phyogs btsal ba dang / rgyud ltar dben pa'am mi 'jigs pa'i sa btsal ba'o //
translated: In the actual search for the site, the site is sought in accordance with karma, and a site that is isolated or free from danger is sought, as in the tantras.

original: brtag pa la yang sbyor ba dngos su song ba las dang sbyar ba kha dog dbyibs brtag pa dang / rgyud ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'o //
analyzed: brtag pa la yang sbyor ba dngos su song ba las dang sbyar ba kha dog dbyibs brtag pa dang / rgyud ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'o //
translated: In the examination, there is the application of the actual examination and the examination of color and shape in accordance with karma, and the examination of the characteristics of the vase, and so on, as in the tantras.

original: bslang ba la yang bdag po dngos por snang ba las bslang ba dang / dngos po med pa las bslang ba'o //
analyzed: bslang ba la yang bdag po dngos por snang ba las bslang ba dang / dngos po med pa las bslang ba'o //
translated: In the case of the ground-laying, there is the ground-laying from the appearance of the actual lord of the site, and the ground-laying from the non-appearance of the actual lord of the site.

original: gzung ba la yang rnal 'byor bzhis gzung ba dang / sa'i lha mo dbang bas gzung ba'o //
analyzed: gzung ba la yang rnal 'byor bzhis gzung ba dang / sa'i lha mo dbang bas gzung ba'o //
translated: In the case of the taking possession, there is the taking possession by the four yogas, and the taking possession by the empowerment of the goddess of the site.

original: gcad pa la yang ji tsam 'dod pa de sa'i lha mo mkha' la bteg la yid kyis gcad pa dang / khro bo'i phur bus phyogs ma nor bar gcad pa'o //
analyzed: gcad pa la yang ji tsam 'dod pa de sa'i lha mo mkha' la bteg la yid kyis gcad pa dang / khro bo'i phur bus phyogs ma nor bar gcad pa'o //
translated: In the case of the cutting, there is the cutting by the mind, lifting the goddess of the site into the sky as much as one wishes, and the cutting by the wrathful dagger without error in the direction.

original: sbyang ba la rdzas dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis sbyang ba lnga las /
analyzed: sbyang ba la rdzas dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis sbyang ba lnga las /
translated: In the case of the purification, there are five: purification by substance, by body, by speech, by mind, and by the deity.

original: rdzas la sa ro mang na legs par bsal /
analyzed: rdzas la sa ro mang na legs par bsal /
translated: In the case of the substance, if there is much bad taste in the earth, it is well removed.

original: gzhan gyis dgang ba dang / rin po che'i bum pa bcud can sba ba dang / gtor ma gtang ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis dgang ba dang / rin po che'i bum pa bcud can sba ba dang / gtor ma gtang ba'o //
translated: There is the filling by others, the hiding of the precious vase with the essence, and the offering of the torma.

original: lus rkang pa rdo rje brkyang bskum gyis bgegs bsal ba'o //
analyzed: lus rkang pa rdo rje brkyang bskum gyis bgegs bsal ba'o //
translated: In the case of the body, the obstructors are removed by the vajra posture with the legs.

original: ngag slob mas /
analyzed: ngag slob mas /
translated: In the case of the speech, the disciples

original: de bzhin gshegs kun zhi ba dang // zhes pa la sogs pa dang / yaksha zhes brjod pas bgegs bsal ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun zhi ba dang // zhes pa la sogs pa dang / yaksha zhes brjod pas bgegs bsal ba'o //
translated: recite “All tathāgatas are peaceful” and so on, and “Yakṣa” and so on, to remove the obstructors.

original: yid dra ba dang / gur dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / rdo rje'i gdan ltar mi 'gyur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: yid dra ba dang / gur dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / rdo rje'i gdan ltar mi 'gyur bar bsam mo //
translated: One should think of the mind as a tent, a fortress, pure from the beginning, and unchanging like the vajra seat.

original: rtsig pa la dri dang ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres la tshad dang ldan par brtsig pa dang / dri dang spos byug pa'o //
analyzed: rtsig pa la dri dang ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres la tshad dang ldan par brtsig pa dang / dri dang spos byug pa'o //
translated: One should build the wall with the right measurements, mixing the five kinds of pure earth with perfume, and anointing it with perfume and incense.

original: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa las bskyed pa dang / nam mkha'i spyan @149a * //
analyzed: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa las bskyed pa dang / nam mkha'i spyan @149a * //
translated: One should generate the earth goddess by means of the special foundation, and invite the sky-goers.

original: drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med byas la bstim pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med byas la bstim pa'o //
translated: One should make offerings, and dissolve them after making them non-dual.

original: 'khor lo lhag gnas las me tog dgod pa dang / lha bskyed pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa gsum pa las /
analyzed: 'khor lo lhag gnas las me tog dgod pa dang / lha bskyed pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa gsum pa las /
translated: In the wheel foundation, there are three topics: placing the flowers, generating the deity, and supplicating.

original: me tog dgod pa la rdo rje slob dpon gyis lha'i gnas su mtshan ma gdab pa dang / las kya slob dpon gyis me tog dgod pa'o //
analyzed: me tog dgod pa la rdo rje slob dpon gyis lha'i gnas su mtshan ma gdab pa dang / las kya slob dpon gyis me tog dgod pa'o //
translated: In placing the flowers, the vajra master places the sign in the deity's place, and the activity master places the flowers.

original: lha bskyed pa ni sbyor ba gsum gyi rnal 'byor bzhi sgrub thabs kyi 'dod pas bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: lha bskyed pa ni sbyor ba gsum gyi rnal 'byor bzhi sgrub thabs kyi 'dod pas bskyed pa'o //
translated: Generating the deity is generating the deity according to one's preference for the four yogas of the three preparations.

original: gsol ba gdab pa la lnga ste /
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa la lnga ste /
translated: In supplicating, there are five topics:

original: slob dpon phyir byung la shar nas yid kyis blta ba dang / 'khor lo'i lha la gsol ba gdab pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyi la gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos skyong la gsol ba gdab pa dang / gsol ba btab la mkha' la gshegs pa'o //🔽bum pa'i lhag gnas la mtshan nyid dang / phyi'i bya ba dang / nang gi bya ba gsum mo //🔽mtshan nyid la grangs lha dang sbyor ba dang / rgyu rin po che'am sa las byas pa dang / mu stegs kyi ma yin pa bre gang las mi chung /
analyzed: slob dpon phyir byung la shar nas yid kyis blta ba dang / 'khor lo'i lha la gsol ba gdab pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyi la gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos skyong la gsol ba gdab pa dang / gsol ba btab la mkha' la gshegs pa'o // bum pa'i lhag gnas la mtshan nyid dang / phyi'i bya ba dang / nang gi bya ba gsum mo // mtshan nyid la grangs lha dang sbyor ba dang / rgyu rin po che'am sa las byas pa dang / mu stegs kyi ma yin pa bre gang las mi chung /
translated: The master comes out and looks to the east with his mind, makes a request to the deities of the maṇḍala, makes a request to the buddhas and bodhisattvas in general, makes a request to the dharmapālas, makes a request, and departs into space.🔽The vase is the basis for the accomplishment of the vase empowerment.

original: bre gsum las mi che ba /
analyzed: bre gsum las mi che ba /
translated: The characteristics are the number, which is in accord with the deity; the material, which is made of precious substances or clay; and the shape, which is not a tīrthika vase, not less than a bre, and not more than three bre.

original: rtsa ba med cing mi gang pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba med cing mi gang pa'o //
translated: It is without a base and is not full.

original: phyi'i bya ba la yang mtshan ma gdab pa dang / kha rgyan mgul rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / gdan la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i bya ba la yang mtshan ma gdab pa dang / kha rgyan mgul rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / gdan la gzhag pa'o //
translated: The outer activities are the consecration of the characteristics, the adornment with a garland and a necklace, and placing it on the seat.

original: nang gi bya ba bcud la drug ste /
analyzed: nang gi bya ba bcud la drug ste /
translated: The inner activities are the six for the elixir.

original: bcud blugs pa dang / gzhal yas khang dang lhar bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi lha dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / sngags bzlas pa dang / bzhu bas bkang la gnas su gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: bcud blugs pa dang / gzhal yas khang dang lhar bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi lha dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / sngags bzlas pa dang / bzhu bas bkang la gnas su gzhag pa'o //
translated: pouring the elixir, generating the celestial mansion and the deity, summoning the gnosis deity, making offerings, reciting the mantra, filling with the melted [butter] and placing in the place.

original: slob ma'i lhag gnas la slob dpon dang / slob ma 'brel ba'i bya ba bdun te /
analyzed: slob ma'i lhag gnas la slob dpon dang / slob ma 'brel ba'i bya ba bdun te /
translated: The disciples' preparatory rite has seven activities related to the master and the disciples:

original: spro ba bskyed pa dang / gnang ba sbyin pa dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dang / bsrung ba dang / so shing dor ba dang / ku sha'i sngags dang stshan byin pa dang / gzengs bstod la nyal du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba bskyed pa dang / gnang ba sbyin pa dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dang / bsrung ba dang / so shing dor ba dang / ku sha'i sngags dang stshan byin pa dang / gzengs bstod la nyal du gzhug pa'o //
translated: rousing enthusiasm, granting permission, giving vows, protecting, discarding the tooth stick, giving the kuśa grass and mantra, and encouraging them to sleep.

original: spro ba bskyed pa la gsum /
analyzed: spro ba bskyed pa la gsum /
translated: Rousing enthusiasm has three parts:

original: slob mas khrus byas la mandal dbul ba dang / slob dbon gyis sngags kyi dngos grub ces pa'i chos bstan pa dang / slob mas pha rol la dmigs te rgya che bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: slob mas khrus byas la mandal dbul ba dang / slob dbon gyis sngags kyi dngos grub ces pa'i chos bstan pa dang / slob mas pha rol la dmigs te rgya che bar shes par bya'o //
translated: the disciples make a mandala offering after bathing, the master teaches the Dharma called the power of mantra, and the disciples should understand the vastness of the object of observation for the other side.

original: gnang ba sbyin pa la nod pa dang / sbyin pa gnyis las /
analyzed: gnang ba sbyin pa la nod pa dang / sbyin pa gnyis las /
translated: Granting permission has two parts: receiving and giving.

original: dga' chen zhes spro bas nod pa dang / bu tshur zhes brtsebs sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dga' chen zhes spro bas nod pa dang / bu tshur zhes brtsebs sbyin pa'o //
translated: The great joy is the delight in taking it up, and come, child! is the giving of affection.

original: spro ba la gsum ste /
analyzed: spro ba la gsum ste /
translated: Delight is threefold:

original: sangs rgyas zhes skyabs su gzhug pa dang / skyabs pa'i yon tan sangs rgyas @149b longs sku /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes skyabs su gzhug pa dang / skyabs pa'i yon tan sangs rgyas @149b longs sku /
translated: The buddha is the one who is to be taken as refuge, and the qualities of refuge are the qualities of the buddha's saṃbhogakāya.🔽The dharma is the practice of the path, and the saṅgha is the principal essence.

original: chos bdebs bsgrub pa dang / dge 'dun gtso bo'i ngo bo bstan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pas slob dpon de gsum dang ldan pa dang / khyod kyi dbang thob nas yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos bdebs bsgrub pa dang / dge 'dun gtso bo'i ngo bo bstan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pas slob dpon de gsum dang ldan pa dang / khyod kyi dbang thob nas yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The vows are the possession of the three: the master, the disciple, and the vows.

original: sdom pa dngos la gnyis te /
analyzed: sdom pa dngos la gnyis te /
translated: The actual vows are twofold:

original: mtshan nyid kyi dang sngags kyi'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi dang sngags kyi'o //
translated: the characteristics and the mantras.

original: mtshan nyid la bdun sngon du song ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid la bdun sngon du song ba'o //
translated: The characteristics are the seven preliminaries.

original: sngags la gnyis te /
analyzed: sngags la gnyis te /
translated: The mantras are twofold:

original: slob dpon gyi dang rigs lnga'i sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dang rigs lnga'i sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa /
translated: the master and the vows of the five families.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gzhug pa'o //
translated: The buddha is the one who is to be taken as refuge.

original: bsrung ba la 'byor bas bsrung ba dang / gdams pas bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba la 'byor bas bsrung ba dang / gdams pas bsrung ba'o //
translated: The protection is twofold: protection by power and protection by instruction.

original: 'byor ba la zhi sogs kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: 'byor ba la zhi sogs kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: The power is the fire offering of pacification and so on.

original: gdams pas bsrung ba la slob ma dang slob dpon gyi bya ba gnyis las /
analyzed: gdams pas bsrung ba la slob ma dang slob dpon gyi bya ba gnyis las /
translated: The protection by means of the instructions has two parts: the disciple’s tasks and the master’s tasks.

original: slob mas bsrung ba la /
analyzed: slob mas bsrung ba la /
translated: The disciple’s tasks are

original: lus gus pas rkang pa g-yas pa'i pus mo sa la btsugs la bsdad pa dang / yid bya ba dran par bya'o //
analyzed: lus gus pas rkang pa g-yas pa'i pus mo sa la btsugs la bsdad pa dang / yid bya ba dran par bya'o //
translated: to sit with the right knee on the ground out of respect for the body, and to be mindful of the activities.

original: slob dpon gyis bsrung ba la ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa dang rdzas gsum gyis bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bsrung ba la ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa dang rdzas gsum gyis bsrung ba'o //
translated: The master’s tasks are the protection by means of samādhi, offerings, and substances.

original: ting nge 'dzin mkha' gsang du slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la gdon pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad lus la gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mkha' gsang du slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la gdon pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad lus la gzhug pa'o //
translated: The protection by means of samādhi is the consecration of the disciples as Vairocana in the space and secret places and the invocation of all buddhas into the body.

original: mchod pa la gnas gsum du dris mtshan ma bya ba dang / lha bskyed pa dang / phyi nang gi mchod pas dngos su mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa la gnas gsum du dris mtshan ma bya ba dang / lha bskyed pa dang / phyi nang gi mchod pas dngos su mchod pa'o //
translated: The protection by means of offerings is the offering of the three places, the creation of the deities, and the actual offerings of outer and inner offerings.

original: rdzas la skud pa dang / gtor ma gnyis las /
analyzed: rdzas la skud pa dang / gtor ma gnyis las /
translated: The protection by means of substances is the protection by means of the thread and the torma.

original: skud pa'i rgyu dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang / gdags sa bzhi las /
analyzed: skud pa'i rgyu dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang / gdags sa bzhi las /
translated: The thread has four parts: the material of the thread, the samādhi, the mantra, and the method of tying it.

original: rgyu ras sam bal lam ring thung sum bsgril mdud ma bdun nam lnga gsum du bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu ras sam bal lam ring thung sum bsgril mdud ma bdun nam lnga gsum du bya'o //
translated: It is knotted seven, five, or three times.

original: ting nge 'dzin la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la sogs par bskyed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la sogs par bskyed /
translated: In samādhi, one generates Amṛtakuṇḍali and so on.

original: ye shes dgug mchod /
analyzed: ye shes dgug mchod /
translated: The gnosis is invoked and offered.

original: gnyis med du byas te /
analyzed: gnyis med du byas te /
translated: They become nondual.

original: sngags de brgya stong du bzlas te go char bsam pa'o //
analyzed: sngags de brgya stong du bzlas te go char bsam pa'o //
translated: The mantra is recited one hundred or one thousand times, and it is visualized as armor.

original: gdags sa skyes pa'i g-yon /
analyzed: gdags sa skyes pa'i g-yon /
translated: The place of wearing is on the left side of a man

original: bud med kyi g-yas su'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi g-yas su'o //
translated: and on the right side of a woman.

original: gtor ma la rgyu byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: gtor ma la rgyu byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: The bali is blessed with the material cause.

original: mgron bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: mgron bsngo ba'o //
translated: The guests are dedicated.

original: rgyu snod ka p'a la dang / rin po che'am /
analyzed: rgyu snod ka p'a la dang / rin po che'am /
translated: The material cause is a kapāla vessel or a precious vessel.

original: de med na shing dang rdo kyong yang bzang /
analyzed: de med na shing dang rdo kyong yang bzang /
translated: If that is not available, a stone or wooden vessel is also good.

original: byin gyis brlab pa snod dang bcud las /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa snod dang bcud las /
translated: The blessing is from the vessel and the contents.

original: snod rlung me bskyed pa ka p'a lar ro //
analyzed: snod rlung me bskyed pa ka p'a lar ro //
translated: The vessel is generated from wind and fire in the kapāla.

original: bcud bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
analyzed: bcud bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
translated: The contents are the five amṛtas and the five meats.

original: mgron la gnas dang / lha gnyis la /
analyzed: mgron la gnas dang / lha gnyis la /
translated: There are two guests: the place and the deity.🔽The place is the source of phenomena and the lotus.

original: gnas chos 'byung padma dang / lha la bskyed pa dang / dgug pa las /
analyzed: gnas chos 'byung padma dang / lha la bskyed pa dang / dgug pa las /
translated: The deity is generated and invoked.

original: bskyed pa bar du chos skyong /
analyzed: bskyed pa bar du chos skyong /
translated: The generation is the dharmapālas in the middle.

original: steng du lha chen po /
analyzed: steng du lha chen po /
translated: The great deity is above.

original: 'og tu klu ste gzhan ltar ro //🔽so shing dor ba la bdun te /
analyzed: 'og tu klu ste gzhan ltar ro // so shing dor ba la bdun te /
translated: The lower end is the nāgas, as before.

original: so shing @150a * //
analyzed: so shing @150a * //
translated: There are seven topics for discarding the tooth stick:🔽the characteristics of the tooth stick,🔽the place to discard it,🔽the direction the disciple faces,🔽the method of discarding it,🔽the purpose,🔽the purpose of that,

original: gi mtshan nyid dang / dor sa dang / slob ma'i kha lta phyogs dang / dor ba'i thabs dang / dgos pa dang / de la dgos pa dang / ltas brtag pa'o //
analyzed: gi mtshan nyid dang / dor sa dang / slob ma'i kha lta phyogs dang / dor ba'i thabs dang / dgos pa dang / de la dgos pa dang / ltas brtag pa'o //
translated: and examining the omens.

original: ku sha'i sngas dang / stan sbyin pa la ku sha bsangs la gtso bo'i sngags kyis sngags su sbyin pa dang / las bum gyis bsangs la las kyi sngags kyis stan du sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: ku sha'i sngas dang / stan sbyin pa la ku sha bsangs la gtso bo'i sngags kyis sngags su sbyin pa dang / las bum gyis bsangs la las kyi sngags kyis stan du sbyin pa'o //
translated: For giving the kuśa pillow and seat, cleanse the kuśa with the principal mantra and give it as the pillow, and cleanse it with the activity vase and give it as the seat with the activity mantra.

original: gzengs bstod nas nyal du gzhug pa la /
analyzed: gzengs bstod nas nyal du gzhug pa la /
translated: For encouraging them to sleep,🔽there are two topics:🔽encouraging them to sleep

original: gzengs bstod pa dang / nyal pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa dang / nyal pa la gnyis te /
translated: and sleeping.

original: slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis /
translated: The master🔽should encourage them with the words “The omniscient one in the world…” and so on.

original: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag / ces nges par bstan pa dang / slob mas spro bas yid ches pas mnyan nas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag / ces nges par bstan pa dang / slob mas spro bas yid ches pas mnyan nas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: The disciples should listen with confidence and delight.

original: nyal ba la spyor ba dang / rmi lam brtags pa dang bzla ba'o //
analyzed: nyal ba la spyor ba dang / rmi lam brtags pa dang bzla ba'o //
translated: For sleeping, there is the practice and examining the dream.

original: sbyor ba la lus seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis dkyil 'khor dang slob dpon la sngags bstan la nyal ba dang / ngag bsnyen pa'i dus kyi snying po bzlas pa dang / yid 'gro ba dang bdag gi don 'dod pas tha mal la ma yengs pas nyal ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba la lus seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis dkyil 'khor dang slob dpon la sngags bstan la nyal ba dang / ngag bsnyen pa'i dus kyi snying po bzlas pa dang / yid 'gro ba dang bdag gi don 'dod pas tha mal la ma yengs pas nyal ba'o //
translated: The performance is lying down in the posture of a sleeping lion, facing the maṇḍala and the master, and reciting the mantra.

original: rmi lam brtag pa ni bdag gi so shing gi ltas dang mthun pa'i thun mong dang mchog gi ltas shog cig / ston cig ces brjod do //
analyzed: rmi lam brtag pa ni bdag gi so shing gi ltas dang mthun pa'i thun mong dang mchog gi ltas shog cig / ston cig ces brjod do //
translated: The examination of dreams is saying, “May I have a dream that is in accord with the omens of the tooth stick, either common or supreme.”

original: rmi lam bzla ba la bzla ba dang brtag pa'o //
analyzed: rmi lam bzla ba la bzla ba dang brtag pa'o //
translated: The examination of dreams is the examination and the recitation.

original: bzla ba bla ma la mandal phul nas dang po'am tha ma gang gsal bzla'o //
analyzed: bzla ba bla ma la mandal phul nas dang po'am tha ma gang gsal bzla'o //
translated: The recitation is reciting the mantra clearly, either at the beginning or the end, after offering a maṇḍala to the guru.

original: brtag pa ni rmi lam bzang ba la sogs pa dang / ngan pa mar nag gis lus byugs sam /
analyzed: brtag pa ni rmi lam bzang ba la sogs pa dang / ngan pa mar nag gis lus byugs sam /
translated: The examination is as follows: If one dreams of good dreams and so on, or bad dreams, such as anointing one’s body with oil,

original: spre'u dang 'bu sprang dang / sdig sprul gyis sos btab pa rmis na zhi sogs man ngag gis sbyin sreg bya /
analyzed: spre'u dang 'bu sprang dang / sdig sprul gyis sos btab pa rmis na zhi sogs man ngag gis sbyin sreg bya /
translated: or being bitten by a monkey, a bee, or a black snake, one should perform a burnt offering with the pacifying and so on intimate instructions.

original: gzhan yang chus khyer ba la sogs pa rmis na sngags mang du bzla /
analyzed: gzhan yang chus khyer ba la sogs pa rmis na sngags mang du bzla /
translated: Furthermore, if one dreams of being carried away by water, and so on, one should recite the mantra many times.

original: gzhan gyis bdag gi nor sogs khyer na bzang pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bdag gi nor sogs khyer na bzang pa'o //
translated: If one's wealth is carried away by others, it is good.

original: gzhan yang bzang ba mang /
analyzed: gzhan yang bzang ba mang /
translated: Furthermore, there are many good [omens].

original: ngan yang sgyu mar shes na zlogs so //
analyzed: ngan yang sgyu mar shes na zlogs so //
translated: If one knows that even bad [omens] are illusory, they are averted.

original: thig la rgyu dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang gdab pa'o //
analyzed: thig la rgyu dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang gdab pa'o //
translated: The lines are the cause, the consecration, and the casting.

original: rgyu dkar po la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: rgyu dkar po la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The cause is the five [colored] threads, white, and so on.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa thig skud 'khal pa bdag lha gtso bo'i ngo bor gsal /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa thig skud 'khal pa bdag lha gtso bo'i ngo bor gsal /
translated: The consecration is the spinning of the thread, clear as the essence of the principal deity.

original: 'khal mkhan shar gyi lhar gsal /
analyzed: 'khal mkhan shar gyi lhar gsal /
translated: The spinner is clear as the deity in the east.

original: nag po dkar po ser dmar ljang gu gtso bo'i 'od kyis ltar gsal /
analyzed: nag po dkar po ser dmar ljang gu gtso bo'i 'od kyis ltar gsal /
translated: The black, white, yellow, red, and green are clear as the light of the principal [deity].

original: 'od kyis rigs kyi thugs dam bskul sa spyang ba dang snod du lha bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi lha dgub /
analyzed: 'od kyis rigs kyi thugs dam bskul sa spyang ba dang snod du lha bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi lha dgub /
translated: The light invokes the spiritual practice of the family, purifies the vessel, generates the deity in the vessel, and invites the gnosis beings.

original: mchod bsgril / gnyis med thig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mchod bsgril / gnyis med thig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: [The thread] is wound around the two [puja] sticks, and becomes the nondual essence.

original: gdab pa ye shes kyi mkha' la gdab pa dang / @150b dam tshig gi skud pas dkyil 'khor dngos la gdab pa dang / ye shes kyi skud bas bsre ba'o //
analyzed: gdab pa ye shes kyi mkha' la gdab pa dang / @150b dam tshig gi skud pas dkyil 'khor dngos la gdab pa dang / ye shes kyi skud bas bsre ba'o //
translated: The “nailing” is the nailing into the space of pristine consciousness and the nailing into the actual maṇḍala with the commitment thread.

original: tshon la rgyu dang byin gyis brlab pa dang dgye ba'o //
analyzed: tshon la rgyu dang byin gyis brlab pa dang dgye ba'o //
translated: The colors are the cause, the consecration, and the spreading.

original: rgyu rin po che'am 'bru'am dur khrod kyi rdzas sam /
analyzed: rgyu rin po che'am 'bru'am dur khrod kyi rdzas sam /
translated: The cause is jewels, grains, charnel ground substances,

original: sa dngos dang lnga'o //
analyzed: sa dngos dang lnga'o //
translated: or the actual earth.

original: phyin gyis brlabs pa lha'i kha dog gis phyogs ma nor bar snod du yi ge bris la gzhag pa dang / ye shes pa dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med tshon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyin gyis brlabs pa lha'i kha dog gis phyogs ma nor bar snod du yi ge bris la gzhag pa dang / ye shes pa dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med tshon du gyur pa'o //
translated: The consecration is the consecration with the colors of the deity, the placement of the syllables in the unerring directions in the vessel, the invocation of the gnosis beings, the offerings, the nonduality, and the transformation into colors.

original: dgye ba la bsrung ba dang / dgye ba dngos so //
analyzed: dgye ba la bsrung ba dang / dgye ba dngos so //
translated: The spreading is the protection and the actual spreading.

original: bsrung ba byang shar du gtso bo'i rim pas sor bzhi dgye ba dang / lha lnga bskyed pa dang / ye shes dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med du gyur nas bgegs mthar byed kyis bsrungs te ka p'a la bkang la gzhag go //
analyzed: bsrung ba byang shar du gtso bo'i rim pas sor bzhi dgye ba dang / lha lnga bskyed pa dang / ye shes dgug pa dang / mchod pa dang / gnyis med du gyur nas bgegs mthar byed kyis bsrungs te ka p'a la bkang la gzhag go //
translated: The protection is performed by Vighnāntakara. The [vase] is filled and placed.

original: dgye ba tshon phyogs dang sa la mnor bar dgye ba dang / tshon phra brtag pa'o //🔽rtsig pa lnga nas re kh'a bar mchod par phyogs nas bris te sngon gyis bsrung ba nas bar chad dam de bas sboms sam /
analyzed: dgye ba tshon phyogs dang sa la mnor bar dgye ba dang / tshon phra brtag pa'o // rtsig pa lnga nas re kh'a bar mchod par phyogs nas bris te sngon gyis bsrung ba nas bar chad dam de bas sboms sam /
translated: The spreading is spreading the colors without error in direction and place, and examining the thin color.

original: phras sam phyi nang du yon slob dpon 'chi ba dang / nad dang / nor nyams pa dang / cho ga 'khrugs pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin 'ong bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phras sam phyi nang du yon slob dpon 'chi ba dang / nad dang / nor nyams pa dang / cho ga 'khrugs pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin 'ong bar shes par bya'o //
translated: From the five walls up to the lines, the colors are drawn in the directions. From the previous protection, obstacles, or more than that, thickness, thinness, or inside and outside, the master should know that death, illness, loss of wealth, disturbance of the ritual, and so on will come in sequence.

original: de las log pa bzang ba'o //
analyzed: de las log pa bzang ba'o //
translated: The opposite of that is good.

original: rtog pa med pa'am mi shes bas bris na nyes pa med /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'am mi shes bas bris na nyes pa med /
translated: If drawn without concept or unknowingly, there is no fault.

original: rgyan dgram pa ni bla bre la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi nam mkha' brgyan pa dang / phyi nang gi mchod pas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan dgram pa ni bla bre la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi nam mkha' brgyan pa dang / phyi nang gi mchod pas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brgyan pa'o //
translated: The ornaments are the ornaments of the space of the mandala with canopies and so forth, and the ornaments of the ground of the mandala with outer and inner offerings.

original: cho ga dngos dbang bskur ba la bzhi las /
analyzed: cho ga dngos dbang bskur ba la bzhi las /
translated: The actual rite of empowerment has four parts:

original: bum pa'i dbang la /
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang la /
translated: The vase empowerment.

original: bum pa la bsgrub pa dang / bskur ba dngos gnyis las /
analyzed: bum pa la bsgrub pa dang / bskur ba dngos gnyis las /
translated: This has two parts: the accomplishment of the vase and the actual conferral of the empowerment.

original: bsgrub pa la rnal 'byor gsum bzhi'o /
analyzed: bsgrub pa la rnal 'byor gsum bzhi'o /
translated: The accomplishment has three or four yogas.

original: bskur ba dngos la slob dpon gyis blang ba dang / slob ma la bskur ba gnyis las /
analyzed: bskur ba dngos la slob dpon gyis blang ba dang / slob ma la bskur ba gnyis las /
translated: The actual conferral of the empowerment has two parts: the master’s taking of the empowerment and the conferral of the empowerment on the disciples.🔽The master’s taking of the empowerment has two parts: entering the mandala and the actual empowerment.

original: slob dpon gyis blang ba la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang dbang dngos gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la zhugs pa dang / zhugs nas phyir shar sgor byung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang ; bla ma de'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis spyan drangs te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis blang ba la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang dbang dngos gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la zhugs pa dang / zhugs nas phyir shar sgor byung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang ; bla ma de'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis spyan drangs te /
translated: Entering the mandala has three parts: entering, having entered, and emerging from the eastern door.

original: de nyid la gzhan pa dang / bdag gi sa bon las spros la phyi nang de nyid kyi mchod pa dbul ba dang / dga' chen zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang / bdud rtsi btung ba dang / mkhyen par gsol ba dang / khyod su zhes dris nas /🔽slob @151a * //🔽dpon dang mi bskyod pa spyi bo na yod pa'i ngo bos bskul nas shar gyi sgo bas nang du bcug pa dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dang / bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas chos dang zhes khas blang ba dang / phyogs bcu nas yang ngo bos bskul /
analyzed: de nyid la gzhan pa dang / bdag gi sa bon las spros la phyi nang de nyid kyi mchod pa dbul ba dang / dga' chen zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang / bdud rtsi btung ba dang / mkhyen par gsol ba dang / khyod su zhes dris nas / slob @151a * // dpon dang mi bskyod pa spyi bo na yod pa'i ngo bos bskul nas shar gyi sgo bas nang du bcug pa dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dang / bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas chos dang zhes khas blang ba dang / phyogs bcu nas yang ngo bos bskul /
translated: One should drink the elixir, request permission, and ask, “Who are you?”🔽The master and Akṣobhya, who is on the crown, are invoked by nature and enter through the eastern door, and the vows are given.🔽One should accept, “I also go for refuge to the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha,” and one is invoked by nature from the ten directions.🔽One is summoned to the eastern door, offered, and all buddhas of the ten directions enter one’s crown.

original: shar sgor bkug mchod nas bdag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lor gyur nas bcug pa dang / mchog gi ye shes byin nas thun mong du las rnams kyang 'grub par lung bstan pa dang / sku'i rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang /
analyzed: shar sgor bkug mchod nas bdag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lor gyur nas bcug pa dang / mchog gi ye shes byin nas thun mong du las rnams kyang 'grub par lung bstan pa dang / sku'i rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang /
translated: One is given the supreme gnosis and is prophesied to accomplish the activities of the common gnosis.🔽The vajra body is summoned and enters.

original: thugs rdo rje bcug pa dang / gsung rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang / de thams cad slob dpon las byung bas mnyan par shes pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes man ngag ltar dbab pa dang / de nas bskor ba bya ba dang /
analyzed: thugs rdo rje bcug pa dang / gsung rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang / de thams cad slob dpon las byung bas mnyan par shes pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes man ngag ltar dbab pa dang / de nas bskor ba bya ba dang /
translated: The gnosis of body, speech, and mind is brought down according to the intimate instruction, and then one should circumambulate and prostrate.

original: phyag bya ba dang / de nas yi dam gyi lha ngo shes pa dang / lha de rnams ngo bo gcig pas tha dad pa ma yin par kun shes pa dang / bdag la de rnams legs pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: phyag bya ba dang / de nas yi dam gyi lha ngo shes pa dang / lha de rnams ngo bo gcig pas tha dad pa ma yin par kun shes pa dang / bdag la de rnams legs pa brjod pa'o //
translated: Then, one should recognize the pledged deity and understand that all those deities are not different because they are of the same nature.

original: dbang la byang chub ces zhu ba dang / bskur ba gnyis las /
analyzed: dbang la byang chub ces zhu ba dang / bskur ba gnyis las /
translated: The empowerment is requested with “Empowerment of the buddhas” and so on, and the conferral is twofold.

original: bskur ba la bgegs khro bos bskrad pa dang / bdag la pad sogs gdan dang / gdugs sogs rgyan dang / bskur ba ste gsum mo //
analyzed: bskur ba la bgegs khro bos bskrad pa dang / bdag la pad sogs gdan dang / gdugs sogs rgyan dang / bskur ba ste gsum mo //
translated: The conferral is threefold: the wrathful expulsion of obstructors, the seat, such as the lotus, and the ornaments, such as the parasol.

original: bskur ba dngos la bum sogs slob mas blang ba dang / rdo rje'i de nyid dang / dril bu'i de nyid dang / phyag rgya'i de nyid bskur ba ltar man ngag gis byin gyis brlabs la dbang blang ngo //
analyzed: bskur ba dngos la bum sogs slob mas blang ba dang / rdo rje'i de nyid dang / dril bu'i de nyid dang / phyag rgya'i de nyid bskur ba ltar man ngag gis byin gyis brlabs la dbang blang ngo //
translated: The actual bestowal is the empowerment of the vase and so forth that the disciple takes, the empowerment of the reality of the vajra, the empowerment of the reality of the bell, and the empowerment of the reality of the seal, which is empowered by the intimate instruction and the empowerment is taken.

original: gsang dbang man ngag bzhin byin gyis brlab /🔽gtang / blang ngo //
analyzed: gsang dbang man ngag bzhin byin gyis brlab / gtang / blang ngo //
translated: The secret empowerment is empowered by the intimate instruction.

original: shes rab ye shes kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The wisdom empowerment is also like that.

original: bzhi pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: The fourth empowerment is also like that.

original: slob ma la dbang bskur ba yang de'i rim pas te /
analyzed: slob ma la dbang bskur ba yang de'i rim pas te /
translated: The empowerment conferred on the disciple is also by that process.

original: de yang dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: That is to say, it is the introduction to the maṇḍala and the conferral of empowerment.

original: gzhug pa la nang du gzhug pa dang / gsang ba bsgo ba dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: gzhug pa la nang du gzhug pa dang / gsang ba bsgo ba dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'o //
translated: The introduction is the introduction inside, the secret command, and the introduction to the maṇḍala.

original: nang du gzhug pa ni las bum chus bsangs pa'i mig ras a'a kham gis byin gyis brlabs la bcing ba dang / a'a kham zlos su gzhug pa dang / dga' chen zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang / las kyi slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang me tog su ra ta stvam /
analyzed: nang du gzhug pa ni las bum chus bsangs pa'i mig ras a'a kham gis byin gyis brlabs la bcing ba dang / a'a kham zlos su gzhug pa dang / dga' chen zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang / las kyi slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang me tog su ra ta stvam /
translated: To usher in, sprinkle with water from the activity vase and give the blindfold.🔽Recite “āḥ khaṃ” and have them repeat it.🔽Recite “Great joy” and have them supplicate.

original: zhes snying gar sbyin /
analyzed: zhes snying gar sbyin /
translated: The activity master gives the vajra and flower to the heart with “Surata satva.”🔽Recite “āḥ khaṃ” and usher them in.

original: a'a kham gis nang du gzhug / gang yin zhes dri /
analyzed: a'a kham gis nang du gzhug / gang yin zhes dri /
translated: Ask, “Who are you?”

original: nang du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: nang du gzhug pa'o //
translated: Usher them in.

original: gsang ba bsgo ba la gsum ste /
analyzed: gsang ba bsgo ba la gsum ste /
translated: The secret command has three parts:

original: rgyud sbyang ba /
analyzed: rgyud sbyang ba /
translated: purifying the continuum,

original: bsgo ba @151b dngos dang ye shes dbab pa'o //
analyzed: bsgo ba @151b dngos dang ye shes dbab pa'o //
translated: the actual command, and the descent of awareness.

original: rgyud sbyang ba la lnga ste /
analyzed: rgyud sbyang ba la lnga ste /
translated: Purifying the continuum has five parts:

original: thog ma zhes pa sdig pa sbyang ba dang / autp'a da yas sems bskyed pa dang / sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / mkha' gsang nas dbyung ba dang / bgegs bsal ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma zhes pa sdig pa sbyang ba dang / autp'a da yas sems bskyed pa dang / sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / mkha' gsang nas dbyung ba dang / bgegs bsal ba'o //
translated: “At the beginning” is purifying misdeeds, generating bodhicitta, taking the vows, extracting from the secret spaces, and dispelling obstructors.

original: bsgo ba dngos la bdun te /
analyzed: bsgo ba dngos la bdun te /
translated: The actual command has seven parts:

original: 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i ;
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i ;
translated: “Arisen from great desire” and so on.

original: /'khor lo'i de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin //
analyzed: /'khor lo'i de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin //
translated: The reality of the wheel is like a reflection.

original: zhes byin gyis brlab cing gnang ba nod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pas smrar mi gzhug pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub thob pa dang / 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
analyzed: zhes byin gyis brlab cing gnang ba nod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pas smrar mi gzhug pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub thob pa dang / 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
translated: The consecration and receiving permission, the not being allowed to speak through being consecrated by the blessing of all the buddhas, the attainment of the supreme siddhi, and the consecration as a vajra by saying, “This is your vajra commitment.”🔽The consecration of the mind vajra by saying, “Vajrasattva,” and the consecration of the speech vajra by saying, “This is your hell,” and the command not to speak.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes thugs rdo rje dang / 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal pa'i zhes gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la smar mi rung bar bsgo ba dang / de rnams slob dpon las byung bas brnyas pa ma byed par bsgo ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes thugs rdo rje dang / 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal pa'i zhes gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la smar mi rung bar bsgo ba dang / de rnams slob dpon las byung bas brnyas pa ma byed par bsgo ba'o //
translated: Since all of those arise from the master, the command not to disrespect him.

original: ye shes dbab pa la slob mas ye shes zhu ba dang / slob ma'i ye shes dbab pa dang / babs na zhes lus ngag yid brtag pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes dbab pa la slob mas ye shes zhu ba dang / slob ma'i ye shes dbab pa dang / babs na zhes lus ngag yid brtag pa'o //
translated: The descent of the awareness has three parts: the request for awareness from the disciple, the descent of the awareness of the disciple, and the examination of body, voice, and mind if it has descended.

original: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la dgu ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la dgu ste /
translated: The introduction into the maṇḍala has nine parts:

original: snying po'i zhes dam bcas pa dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / pra ti zhes me tog dor ba dang / snang ba dri ba dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa dngos grub rab 'bring brtag pa dang / stobs po che zhes me tog mgor bcing ba dang /
analyzed: snying po'i zhes dam bcas pa dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / pra ti zhes me tog dor ba dang / snang ba dri ba dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa dngos grub rab 'bring brtag pa dang / stobs po che zhes me tog mgor bcing ba dang /
translated: The essence is the commitment, the turning of the wheel, the pratī is the casting of the flower, the bhāsa is the question about the vision, the examination of the supreme, middling, and inferior powers such as the uṣṇīṣa, and the mahābala is the binding of the flower on the head.

original: aom rdo rje sems dpa' zhes mig dbye ba dang / ltos shig ces dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / shar sgo nas dbus kyi bar du lha bstan pa'o //
analyzed: aom rdo rje sems dpa' zhes mig dbye ba dang / ltos shig ces dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / shar sgo nas dbus kyi bar du lha bstan pa'o //
translated: The oṃ vajrasattva is the opening of the eyes, the paśya is the display of the maṇḍala, and the display of the deities from the eastern door up to the center.

original: la la de kho na nyid 'dir ston te de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: la la de kho na nyid 'dir ston te de ni ma yin te /
translated: Some say that reality is taught here, but that is not so.

original: sam gra ha nas dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan /
analyzed: sam gra ha nas dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan /
translated: After the consecration, reality is taught,

original: gzhan du na ni dngos grub dag /
analyzed: gzhan du na ni dngos grub dag /
translated: otherwise, the powers

original: shin tu ring bar 'gyur ro zhes //
analyzed: shin tu ring bar 'gyur ro zhes //
translated: would be very far away.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag gsungs //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag gsungs //
translated: Thus, the vajra holder has said.

original: zhes pas dbang rdzogs nas 'khor lo de nyid bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas dbang rdzogs nas 'khor lo de nyid bstan par bya'o //
translated: Thus, after the consecration is complete, the reality of the wheel should be taught.

original: dbang bskur ba la slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang bskur ba gnyis so //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba la slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang bskur ba gnyis so //
translated: In the consecration, there are two parts: pleasing the master and the consecration.

original: mnyes pa la phyi nang de nyid gsum mchod pa las phyi'i mchod pa yon du lus ngag yid gsum dang bcas pa dbul ba man ngag gis so //
analyzed: mnyes pa la phyi nang de nyid gsum mchod pa las phyi'i mchod pa yon du lus ngag yid gsum dang bcas pa dbul ba man ngag gis so //
translated: From among them, the outer offering is the offering of one's body, speech, and mind together with gifts.

original: nang sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga'am byin gyis brlabs la nang gi spyin sreg tu bya'o //
analyzed: nang sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga'am byin gyis brlabs la nang gi spyin sreg tu bya'o //
translated: The inner offering is the five meats and five nectars or the consecrated substances that are offered as inner fire offerings.

original: de kho na nyid ni dbang gi ye shes pas ga bur ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni dbang gi ye shes pas ga bur ma nyams pa'o //
translated: The suchness offering is the gnosis of the empowerment, which is not spoiled by camphor.🔽In the urging, there are two: the urging of the vase and so on and the urging of the disciples.

original: bskul ba la bum pa la sogs pa bzhi las bum pa la sbyor @152a * //
analyzed: bskul ba la bum pa la sogs pa bzhi las bum pa la sbyor @152a * //
translated: The urging of the vase and so on has two parts: the preparation and the actual urging.🔽The preparation has seven parts:🔽the preparation of the seat,🔽the preparation of the offerings,🔽the preparation of the articles for auspiciousness, such as the parasol,🔽the preparation of the articles for the auspicious substances,🔽the preparation of the articles for the auspicious substances,

analyzed: ba dang / dngos gnyis las sbyor ba rdo rje zhes nod pa dang / gdan bsham pa dang / rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / gdugs la sogs pa bkra shis kyi rdzas dang / mchod pa bsham pa dang / til la sogs pas bgegs bskrad pa dang /🔽phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te bcug nas mchod pa dang / phun sum zhes bkra shis brjod pa'o //

original: dngos la phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis 'khor lo mchod lha mo lnga dang rigs lngar gyur te /
analyzed: dngos la phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis 'khor lo mchod lha mo lnga dang rigs lngar gyur te /
translated: In actuality, the outer, inner, and secret offerings are made to the five goddesses of the chakras and the five families.🔽Since the buddhas’ eyes wash the outer aspect with many activities, imagine that the stains are removed from the feet.

original: sangs rgyas spyan gyis las du ma gyis phyi ltar zhes bkrus pas dri ma rkang par bud par bsam pa dang / he ru ka dang rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsang ba gsum zhes pas gtso bo dang / shar bum bskur bas sku'i rigs thams cad dang bcas pas lus la bcug nas bdud rtsis lus rgyas te dpral bar rnam snang byon pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan gyis las du ma gyis phyi ltar zhes bkrus pas dri ma rkang par bud par bsam pa dang / he ru ka dang rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsang ba gsum zhes pas gtso bo dang / shar bum bskur bas sku'i rigs thams cad dang bcas pas lus la bcug nas bdud rtsis lus rgyas te dpral bar rnam snang byon pa'o //
translated: Since Heruka and Vairocana enter the secret of all buddhas of the ten directions, the principal and all the buddhas of the body family enter the body, the body is filled with amṛta, and Vairocana arrives at the forehead.

original: de nas chus bsangs te cod pan dang / thor tshugs la rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas chus bsangs te cod pan dang / thor tshugs la rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed de /
translated: Then, after sprinkling with water, generate Ratnasaṃbhava in the crown and topknot.

original: ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug mchod bstims nas thor tshugs su gyur /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug mchod bstims nas thor tshugs su gyur /
translated: The awareness beings are invoked, offered, and dissolved, and the topknot is formed.

original: m'a ma k'i sa ji ltar zhes bskrus pas dri ma dang sgrib pa rkang par bud par bsam pa dang / he ru ka ra rin chen 'byung ldan gyis /🔽phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i sa ji ltar zhes bskrus pas dri ma dang sgrib pa rkang par bud par bsam pa dang / he ru ka ra rin chen 'byung ldan gyis / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: Heruka means jewel-born.🔽 Since one is empowered with the vase of the principal one and the goddesses, holding the three secrets of all buddhas of the ten directions,

original: gsang ba gsum las byung pa yis //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum las byung pa yis //
translated: arisen from the three secrets of all buddhas of the ten directions

original: zhes gtso bo dang lha mo'i bum pa thogs nas bskur bas yon tan gyi rigs thams cad dang bcas pa lus la bcud pas bdud rtsis lus brgyan te rna ltag g-yas su rin chen 'byung ldan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gtso bo dang lha mo'i bum pa thogs nas bskur bas yon tan gyi rigs thams cad dang bcas pa lus la bcud pas bdud rtsis lus brgyan te rna ltag g-yas su rin chen 'byung ldan du gyur pa'o //
translated: means that since one is empowered with the vase of the principal one and the goddesses, all types of qualities are gathered into the body, the body is ornamented with amṛta, and Ratnasaṃbhava is in the right ear.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje dang bdag po dar /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje dang bdag po dar /
translated: Similarly, the vajra and the master are extended.

original: ming rnams la yang go bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming rnams la yang go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand the names.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni slob dpon kha cig 'dir 'dod mod kyi /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni slob dpon kha cig 'dir 'dod mod kyi /
translated: Although some masters assert that the vajra master empowerment is here,

original: rje ri khrod zhabs kyis 'dir bzhi pa yan chad bskur nas so //
analyzed: rje ri khrod zhabs kyis 'dir bzhi pa yan chad bskur nas so //
translated: the venerable one, Rikpé  Zhepa, asserts that the fourth empowerment is conferred here.

original: de la 'dir rdo rje'i de nyid spyin pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir rdo rje'i de nyid spyin pa ni /
translated: Here, the vajra reality is given.

original: rdo rje la gong ltar byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rjer gyur pa de tshigs bcad dang sngags kyis sbyin te /
analyzed: rdo rje la gong ltar byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rjer gyur pa de tshigs bcad dang sngags kyis sbyin te /
translated: The vajra is consecrated as above. The vajra is given with the verse and mantra.

original: slob ma'i lag pa g-yas su ma las nyi ma h'um gser gyi rdo rjer gyur par bsgom du bcug la de gnyis med du gzung zhes pas sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i lag pa g-yas su ma las nyi ma h'um gser gyi rdo rjer gyur par bsgom du bcug la de gnyis med du gzung zhes pas sbyin pa'o //
translated: The disciple imagines that a sun arises from ma in his right hand, and a golden vajra arises from hūṃ. The vajra is given with the words “Take the vajra in the right hand.”

original: dril bu'i de nyid kyang de bzhin nyid du byas la /
analyzed: dril bu'i de nyid kyang de bzhin nyid du byas la /
translated: The bell is also made into suchness.

original: lag pa g-yon par aa dang kham @152b las zla ba dang dril bur gyur pa dang gnyis med du sbyin no //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon par aa dang kham @152b las zla ba dang dril bur gyur pa dang gnyis med du sbyin no //
translated: The disciple imagines that a moon arises from a in his left hand, and a bell arises from khaṃ. The bell is given with the words “Take the bell in the left hand.”

original: thog mtha' med ces pa dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gsor ba dang dkrol ba gsum gsum byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: thog mtha' med ces pa dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gsor ba dang dkrol ba gsum gsum byed du gzhug go //
translated: The disciple is made to ring the bell three times with the words “This bell is without beginning or end” and “This is the bell of all buddhas.”

original: phyag rgya'i de nyid dngos sam bskyed pa yang dam tshig dang ye shes pa mchod pa dang gnyis med du gyur nas sbyin no //

translated: The faults of speech are purified by the secret empowerment, and it serves as the basis for the saṃbhogakāya.

original: bde chen sku'i rten byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde chen sku'i rten byed pa'o //
translated: The faults of the mind are purified by the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment, and it serves as the basis for the mahāsukhakāya.

original: rgyud don shes par bya ba ni lta ba ste /

original: 'di rab tu mi gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di rab tu mi gnas pa yin te /

analyzed: sems tsam du 'dod pa dang / sgyu mar 'dod pa yang nyes pa med par brjod do //
translated: It is said that there is no fault in asserting the mind only or the illusion.

analyzed: de la rgal ba bye brag tu smra ba dang / gzhan don byed ma btub na mdo sde ba theg pa chen por 'dod la sngags su cis ma btub ce na /
translated: The objection is this: If the Vaibhāṣika and Sautrāntika are not able to benefit others, why are they asserted to be the Mahāyāna, but not Mantra?

original: yul sems so sor 'dod pas zhe'o //
analyzed: yul sems so sor 'dod pas zhe'o //
translated: It is said that the mind and the object are asserted to be separate.

original: 'o na zla ba grags pas sgron gsal du gnyis bshad pa zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na zla ba grags pas sgron gsal du gnyis bshad pa zhe na /
translated: Well, then, Candrakirti explains two in the Illuminating Lamp.

original: de kun rdzob tu bstan zhe'o //
analyzed: de kun rdzob tu bstan zhe'o //
translated: He says that they are taught as the conventional.

original: 'o na dngos por 'dzin pa skyon nam don dam skyon rnam pa bcas kyang zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dngos por 'dzin pa skyon nam don dam skyon rnam pa bcas kyang zhe na /
translated: Well, then, is the fault in holding to things or in the ultimate?

original: de rnams sems su 'dod pas zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams sems su 'dod pas zhes so //
translated: He says that they are asserted as the mind.

original: 'o na mdo sde pa rnams dang / sems tsam pa rten 'brel zer ba zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mdo sde pa rnams dang / sems tsam pa rten 'brel zer ba zhe na /

original: rten 'brel du 'dod pa tha dad ces so //
analyzed: rten 'brel du 'dod pa tha dad ces so //
translated: He says that the assertions of dependent origination are different.

original: rgyud kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ltar yang shes par bya ba /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ltar yang shes par bya ba /
translated: The reason for the tantra is to be understood as other.

original: 'dir rgyu'i rgyud sems can /
analyzed: 'dir rgyu'i rgyud sems can /
translated: Here, the causal continuum is sentient beings.

original: thabs kyi rgyud rgyud sde bzhi /
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud rgyud sde bzhi /
translated: The method continuum is the four classes of tantra.

original: 'bras bu'i rgyud sku bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyud sku bzhi'o //
translated: The resultant continuum is the four bodies.

original: de yang brgyud pas rgyud de /
analyzed: de yang brgyud pas rgyud de /
translated: Moreover, it is a continuum because of a succession.

original: sems can las brgyud pas sku bzhi /
analyzed: sems can las brgyud pas sku bzhi /
translated: The four bodies are a succession from sentient beings.

original: 'brel pas rgyud /
analyzed: 'brel pas rgyud /
translated: It is a continuum because of a connection.

original: thabs rgyu des 'brel nas ma nor bas rgyud sku bzhi 'dod pa 'byung la //
analyzed: thabs rgyu des 'brel nas ma nor bas rgyud sku bzhi 'dod pa 'byung la //
translated: The four bodies are asserted as a continuum because of the connection of that method cause without error.

original: de ltar rgyu thabs dang 'bras bur brgyud nas 'brel zhing ma nor bar 'dus pas rgyud du gdags so //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu thabs dang 'bras bur brgyud nas 'brel zhing ma nor bar 'dus pas rgyud du gdags so //
translated: Thus, it is designated as a tantra because it is connected through the cause and method and the result, and because it is an unerring assembly.

original: 'dus pa las 'bras bu 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa las 'bras bu 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The result is an assembly from the assembly.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas /
translated: As the Vajradaka says:

original: rgyud kyi don ni gnyis yin te //
analyzed: rgyud kyi don ni gnyis yin te //
translated: The meaning of tantra is twofold:

original: don dam pa dang kun rdzob bden //
analyzed: don dam pa dang kun rdzob bden //
translated: The ultimate and relative truths.

original: don dam brjod du mi nus te //
analyzed: don dam brjod du mi nus te //
translated: The ultimate is inexpressible.

original: kun rdzob chu yi zla ltar bstan //
analyzed: kun rdzob chu yi zla ltar bstan //
translated: The relative is taught to be like the moon in the water.

original: zhes pas don dam la brjod du med do //
analyzed: zhes pas don dam la brjod du med do //
translated: Thus, the ultimate is inexpressible.

original: kun rdzob la kun rdzob dngos dang / don dam la spyang du med pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob la kun rdzob dngos dang / don dam la spyang du med pa'o //
translated: The relative is twofold: the actual relative and the ultimate.

original: kun rdzob dngos la gnyis te /🔽kun rdzob la gong bzhin gnyis /
analyzed: kun rdzob dngos la gnyis te / kun rdzob la gong bzhin gnyis /
translated: The actual relative is twofold:

original: rnal 'byor pa'i yang sngags dang mtshan nyid gnyis /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i yang sngags dang mtshan nyid gnyis /
translated: the relative is as above, and the yogic practitioner is also twofold: mantra and philosophy.

original: sngags la yang gzugs sku dang / chos sku gnyis /
analyzed: sngags la yang gzugs sku dang / chos sku gnyis /
translated: The mantra is also twofold: the form body and the truth body.

original: chos sku la yang bde ba chen po dang / stong pa gnyis so //
analyzed: chos sku la yang bde ba chen po dang / stong pa gnyis so //
translated: The truth body is also twofold: great bliss and emptiness.

original: de yang kun spyod nas /
analyzed: de yang kun spyod nas /
translated: Moreover, the Samvarodaya Tantra says:

original: 'gro pa 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
analyzed: 'gro pa 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
translated: All migrating beings are the nature of the five buddhas.

original: gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang //
analyzed: gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang //
translated: Like a dancer or a beautiful painting.

original: gang du bde chen zhes pa gcig po nyid //
analyzed: gang du bde chen zhes pa gcig po nyid //
translated: Where the one called “great bliss”

original: gcig po nyams nam @153b du mas gar mdzad do //🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: gcig po nyams nam @153b du mas gar mdzad do // zhes pas so //
translated: Dances with many forms.

original: des don dam brjod du med kyang /
analyzed: des don dam brjod du med kyang /
translated: Thus, although the ultimate is inexpressible,

original: kun rdzob tu bde ba chen po'i ngo bo kho na yin la /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu bde ba chen po'i ngo bo kho na yin la /
translated: It is the essence of great bliss in the relative.

original: chos thams cad gsang sngags yin la /
analyzed: chos thams cad gsang sngags yin la /
translated: All phenomena are mantra,

original: gsang sngags kyis 'tshang rgya ba'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyis 'tshang rgya ba'o //
translated: And one becomes enlightened through mantra.

original: de ltar na sh'akya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas pa sngags kyis yin par bstan la /
analyzed: de ltar na sh'akya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas pa sngags kyis yin par bstan la /
translated: Thus, it is taught that Śākyamuni and other tathāgatas became buddhas through mantra.

original: bskal pa grangs med gsum du pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston pas sangs rgyas so zhe na /
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med gsum du pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston pas sangs rgyas so zhe na /
translated: If it is said that they became buddhas through teaching the six perfections for three incalculable aeons,

original: kun spyod nas /
analyzed: kun spyod nas /
translated: The conduct of the buddhas

original: rgyud rnams kun du gsang ba yang //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du gsang ba yang //
translated: Is secret in all tantras.

original: rgyud 'di yis ni rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: rgyud 'di yis ni rnal 'byor ba //
translated: Through this tantra,

original: bden pa gnyis la yang dag bsten //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis la yang dag bsten //
translated: Yogis rely on the two truths.

original: sprul pa dngos la de nyid bstan //
analyzed: sprul pa dngos la de nyid bstan //
translated: The reality of the emanations is taught.

original: zhes pas bde ba chen po brjod du med pa mu bzhi dang bral te /
analyzed: zhes pas bde ba chen po brjod du med pa mu bzhi dang bral te /
translated: Thus, great bliss is inexpressible and free from the four alternatives.

original: phyi rabs la bden gnyis zhes pha rol tu phyin par sprul skur bstan yang /
analyzed: phyi rabs la bden gnyis zhes pha rol tu phyin par sprul skur bstan yang /
translated: Although the emanation body is taught as the perfection in the future,

analyzed: sprul sku nyid sems can la sngags dang / pha rol tu phyin par snang ste /
translated: the emanation body itself appears as mantra and the perfection to sentient beings.

original: sprul sku nyid bde ba chen po nyid do //
analyzed: sprul sku nyid bde ba chen po nyid do //
translated: The emanation body itself is great bliss.

original: snang ba de sngon du rgyu dang / rkyen song bas 'byung ste /
analyzed: snang ba de sngon du rgyu dang / rkyen song bas 'byung ste /
translated: That appearance arises from having previously gone through causes and conditions.

original: tsa ri ka pa bzhin mkha' ltar yas phub ces rgyu med min no //
analyzed: tsa ri ka pa bzhin mkha' ltar yas phub ces rgyu med min no //
translated: It is not causeless, like the sky, as the Carīka-pāda maintains.

original: des na bde ba chen po yin yang sems can gyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas bde ba chen po thob nas tshogs chung zhing sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: des na bde ba chen po yin yang sems can gyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas bde ba chen po thob nas tshogs chung zhing sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, although it is great bliss, for the sake of sentient beings, the perfection is taught. Having attained great bliss, the assembly is small and one becomes a buddha.

original: thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud nas /
analyzed: thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud nas /
translated: In the Tantra of the Secret of All,🔽it says:🔽For example, a master of sound

analyzed: dper na sgra yi mkhan po dag / sgra yi skyon med don tshol te //
translated: seeks the meaning of sound without fault.🔽To those who do not know,

original: ma shes pa la ka k'a dang // ki k'i dbyangs yig ston par byed //
analyzed: ma shes pa la ka k'a dang // ki k'i dbyangs yig ston par byed //
translated: he teaches the vowels of kākā and kīkī.

original: ces pas 'dir yang sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba chen por gnas la 'gro pa'i khyad par gyi theg pa'i rim par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ces pas 'dir yang sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba chen por gnas la 'gro pa'i khyad par gyi theg pa'i rim par bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, too, all the buddhas abide in great bliss, and the vehicles are taught as the stages of going.

original: lam 'dus par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: lam 'dus par bstan pa'o //
translated: The path is taught as being included.

original: chos kyi phung por 'dus pa yang //
analyzed: chos kyi phung por 'dus pa yang //
translated: The aggregates of Dharma are included.🔽All the aggregates of Dharma,

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun //
translated: the eighty-four thousand,

original: yi ge gnyis su de bzhin 'dus //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis su de bzhin 'dus //
translated: are included in two syllables.

original: zhes pas gsang sngags kyang thabs gzugs sku bskyed rim dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgyar 'dus la /
analyzed: zhes pas gsang sngags kyang thabs gzugs sku bskyed rim dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgyar 'dus la /

analyzed: shes rab chos sku dang bde ba chen por 'byung bas phyag rgya chen por 'dus pas so //

original: de yang aa wam ma y'a shru ta me kasmin /
analyzed: de yang aa wam ma y'a shru ta me kasmin /
translated: Moreover, a vaṃ ma yā śru tam e kaṣmin

original: zhes pa dang / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
translated: and “Thus, I heard at one time”

original: zhes rgyud sde bzhi /
analyzed: zhes rgyud sde bzhi /
translated: are the four classes of tantra.

original: phyag rgya bzhi sku bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi sku bzhi'o //
translated: The four mudras are the four bodies.

original: de yang ae las kyi phyag rgya /
analyzed: de yang ae las kyi phyag rgya /
translated: Moreover, e is the karma mudra.

original: 'di skad ces dngos min te las kyi phyag rgyas dpe mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces dngos min te las kyi phyag rgyas dpe mtshon pa'o //
translated: It is said that this is not an entity, but is illustrated by the example of the karmamudrā.

original: bam chos kyi phyag rgya 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bam chos kyi phyag rgya 'di lta ste /
translated: The dharma mudrā is like this:

original: don chos kyi phyag @154a * //
analyzed: don chos kyi phyag @154a * //
translated: The meaning is the dharma mudrā.

original: rgya rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: rgya rnyed pa'o //
translated: It is attained.

original: ma phyag rgya chen po skad ces pas brdas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: ma phyag rgya chen po skad ces pas brdas mtshon pa'o //
translated: The mahāmudrā is indicated by the term “great.”

original: rigs pas mi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pas mi rnyed pa'o //
translated: It is not attained by reasoning.

original: y'a dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'di skad ces pas sprul pa sgyu mar snang ba'o //
analyzed: y'a dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'di skad ces pas sprul pa sgyu mar snang ba'o //
