original: de bzhin dang sgra'i stobs kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin dang sgra'i stobs kyis /
translated: In the same way, by the power of the words,🔽śrutaṃ me means “at one time I heard.”

original: shr'u ta me ka smin bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig la sbyar nas dhrma k'a ya /
analyzed: shr'u ta me ka smin bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig la sbyar nas dhrma k'a ya /
translated: The dharma kāya,

original: sam bho ga k'a ya /
analyzed: sam bho ga k'a ya /
translated: the sambhoga kāya,

original: nir ma na k'a ya /
analyzed: nir ma na k'a ya /
translated: and the nirmāṇa kāya

original: ma h'a su kha k'a ya ni rim pa ltar chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang / bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ma h'a su kha k'a ya ni rim pa ltar chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang / bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba'o //
translated: are the dharmakāya, the saṃbhogakāya, and the nirmāṇakāya, respectively.

original: rgyu 'dus pas sems can gyi bsam pas 'dul ba dang / theg pa chung bkri yog tu 'dus la /
analyzed: rgyu 'dus pas sems can gyi bsam pas 'dul ba dang / theg pa chung bkri yog tu 'dus la /
translated: The cause is the assembly of the mind of sentient beings to be guided and the small vehicle.

original: mngon pa dang theg pa chen po nang par 'dus so //
analyzed: mngon pa dang theg pa chen po nang par 'dus so //
translated: The Abhidharma and the Mahayana are included in the morning gathering.

original: rdo rje phreng ba nas /🔽thabs chung bya mang don ring bas //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba nas / thabs chung bya mang don ring bas //
translated: The Vajra Garland states:

original: phyi pa kri yog spyod lam ste //
analyzed: phyi pa kri yog spyod lam ste //
translated: The outer way is for those with little skill, many activities, and distant goals.

original: thabs che bya nyung don nye bas //🔽de phyir nang ste bla na med //
analyzed: thabs che bya nyung don nye bas // de phyir nang ste bla na med //
translated: The inner way is for those with great skill, few activities, and close goals.🔽Therefore, it is unsurpassed.

original: ces so // de yang drang don nges don du 'dus te /
analyzed: ces so // de yang drang don nges don du 'dus te /
translated: Moreover, the outer and inner ways are included in the provisional and definitive meanings.

original: 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i mdo nas /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i mdo nas /
translated: The Sutra Requested by Manjushri states:

original: 'og ma gong du 'gro bas drang ba ste //
analyzed: 'og ma gong du 'gro bas drang ba ste //
translated: The lower is provisional because it leads to the higher.

original: ma nor de nyid 'byung bas nges pa yin /
analyzed: ma nor de nyid 'byung bas nges pa yin /
translated: The definitive is the source of unerring suchness.

original: zhes pas de yang mtshan nyid thams cad drang don /🔽sangs rgyas bde ba chen por 'gro bas gsang sngags thams cad nges don /
analyzed: zhes pas de yang mtshan nyid thams cad drang don / sangs rgyas bde ba chen por 'gro bas gsang sngags thams cad nges don /
translated: Thus, all the teachings on characteristics are provisional meaning.🔽All the secret mantra is definitive meaning because it leads to the great bliss of buddhahood.🔽All the sutras of the Vinaya and the Abhidharma are provisional meaning because they lead to the great bliss of buddhahood and to the Abhidharma.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba chen por gnas pas 'dul ba dang / theg pa chung du'i mdo drang don chen po dang mngon par 'gro bas mngon pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo thams cad nges don /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba chen por gnas pas 'dul ba dang / theg pa chung du'i mdo drang don chen po dang mngon par 'gro bas mngon pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo thams cad nges don /
translated: All the sutras of the Mahayana are definitive meaning.

original: 'gro don du nges pas 'dul ba drang don /
analyzed: 'gro don du nges pas 'dul ba drang don /
translated: Since it is certain that it benefits beings, the Vinaya is the expedient meaning.

original: chung ba'i dmos de nges don /
analyzed: chung ba'i dmos de nges don /
translated: Since it is the lesser vehicle, it is the definitive meaning.

original: rgyu las dang 'bras bu ston pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gong du 'gro bas theg pa chen po'i drang don /
analyzed: rgyu las dang 'bras bu ston pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gong du 'gro bas theg pa chen po'i drang don /
translated: Since it teaches the causes and results, the five perfections are the expedient meaning of the Mahāyāna.

original: rgyu de rnams shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin par nges don no //
analyzed: rgyu de rnams shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin par nges don no //
translated: Since those causes are ascertained in the perfection of wisdom, it is the definitive meaning.

original: rgyu las dang 'bras bur 'dod pas kri yog drang don /
analyzed: rgyu las dang 'bras bur 'dod pas kri yog drang don /
translated: Since it is asserted that the causes are the results, the Kriyā and Yoga tantras are the expedient meaning.

original: ma nor ba'i 'bras bu nyid la spyod pas nang pa nges don /
analyzed: ma nor ba'i 'bras bu nyid la spyod pas nang pa nges don /
translated: Since one practices in the undeluded result, the inner tantras are the definitive meaning.

original: thabs la brten nas 'gro bas pha rgyud drang don /
analyzed: thabs la brten nas 'gro bas pha rgyud drang don /
translated: Since one proceeds in dependence on the method, the father tantras are the expedient meaning.

original: shes rab rgyud la gtogs pas ma rgyud nges don /
analyzed: shes rab rgyud la gtogs pas ma rgyud nges don /
translated: Since the wisdom tantras are included, the mother tantras are the definitive meaning.

original: de rnams rim par brgyud pas rgyud rnams drang don /
analyzed: de rnams rim par brgyud pas rgyud rnams drang don /
translated: Since those are transmitted in stages, the tantras are the expedient meaning.

original: rgyud don sku bzhir nges pas nges don te /
analyzed: rgyud don sku bzhir nges pas nges don te /
translated: Since the meaning of the tantras is ascertained in the four kāyas, it is the definitive meaning.

original: sku bzhi sgyu ma kun rdzob yin pas drang ba'i don //
analyzed: sku bzhi sgyu ma kun rdzob yin pas drang ba'i don //
translated: Since the four kāyas are the relative truth of illusion, it is the expedient meaning.

original: don dam mtshon du med pas nges par shes par gyis //
analyzed: don dam mtshon du med pas nges par shes par gyis //
translated: Since the ultimate cannot be illustrated, understand it to be the definitive meaning.

original: zhes mtshon pas grub med nyams dga' tsam sku bzhi 'grub par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes mtshon pas grub med nyams dga' tsam sku bzhi 'grub par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the four bodies are accomplished by the mere delight of non-establishment.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shes par bya ba la sgra don @154b gnyis las /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shes par bya ba la sgra don @154b gnyis las /
translated: In order to understand the ritual of the maṇḍala, there are two topics:🔽the meaning of the words and the special meaning.

original: sgra la bsnyen pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi chg ga dang / dbang bskur gyi cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba gong ltar ram /🔽gzhan ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra la bsnyen pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi chg ga dang / dbang bskur gyi cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba gong ltar ram / gzhan ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the words is the approach, the ritual of the maṇḍala, the ritual of empowerment, and the empowerment, which should be understood as above or otherwise.

original: don gyi khyad par la nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba dang / drang don nges don du sgrub pa la gnyis las nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba la gnyis te /
analyzed: don gyi khyad par la nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba dang / drang don nges don du sgrub pa la gnyis las nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba la gnyis te /
translated: The special meaning is understanding the definitive meaning and the interpretable meaning, and establishing the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning.

original: nges don ni dkyil zhes bya /
analyzed: nges don ni dkyil zhes bya /
translated: The definitive meaning is called “maṇḍala.”

original: dbu ma zhes bya ba dang / ma dhya ma ste /
analyzed: dbu ma zhes bya ba dang / ma dhya ma ste /
translated: It is called “madhyama” and “madhyamaka.”

original: dbu ma mu bzhi dang bral ba la /
analyzed: dbu ma mu bzhi dang bral ba la /
translated: The middle free from the four extremes

original: gang mu bzhi dang bral na 'khor zhes bya /🔽g-yog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang mu bzhi dang bral na 'khor zhes bya / g-yog ces bya'o //
translated: is called “maṇḍala” if free from the four extremes.🔽It is called “retinue” and “attendant.”

original: ka bya dha ra ste /
analyzed: ka bya dha ra ste /
translated: It is called “vajra” and “vajradhara.”

original: dngos por 'dzin pa mu bzhi dang bral la /
analyzed: dngos por 'dzin pa mu bzhi dang bral la /
translated: The apprehender of entities free from the four extremes

original: cha ge zhes bya /
analyzed: cha ge zhes bya /
translated: is called “part.”

original: sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “accomplishment.”

original: s'a dha sa ha dza ste ;
analyzed: s'a dha sa ha dza ste ;
translated: Sādhasaha means

original: lhan cig gdod nas gnyis med du yod par shes pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig gdod nas gnyis med du yod par shes pa'o //
translated: that one knows that they are primordially nondual.

original: drang don du snod du bya ba shes pa dang / bcud du bya ba la yang bsnyen pa dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: drang don du snod du bya ba shes pa dang / bcud du bya ba la yang bsnyen pa dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba shes par bya'o //
translated: In the expedient meaning, one should know the vessel, which is the knowledge of the ritual of the maṇḍala, and the essence, which is the conferral of empowerment.🔽In the definitive meaning, that which is to be known is as follows.

original: nges don dang dang don du shes par bya ba de yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje nas /
analyzed: nges don dang dang don du shes par bya ba de yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje nas /
translated: In the Hevajra Tantra,🔽it states:

original: ston pa po nga chos kyang nga ;
analyzed: ston pa po nga chos kyang nga ;
translated: “I am the teacher, I am the dharma,

original: / nyan pa'i tshogs ldan zhu ba nga //
analyzed: / nyan pa'i tshogs ldan zhu ba nga //
translated: I am the assembly of the listeners, I am the questioner,🔽and I am the one who asks the questions.”

original: zhes pas de dag thams cad nges par bcom ldan 'das nyid sems can drang ba'i don du mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pas de dag thams cad nges par bcom ldan 'das nyid sems can drang ba'i don du mdzad pa ste /
translated: Thus, all of those are definitely the deeds of the Bhagavān himself for the purpose of guiding sentient beings.

original: nyan thos dang / so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs pa rnams la ni mdo dang 'dul ba ltar yang snang ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs pa rnams la ni mdo dang 'dul ba ltar yang snang ste /
translated: For the hearers, ordinary beings, and tīrthikas, it appears as the sūtras and the vinaya.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gong ltar sngom pa gsum ldan de snang ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gong ltar sngom pa gsum ldan de snang ba'o //
translated: For the bodhisattvas, it appears as the three sets of vows as mentioned above.

original: bsnyen pa'i dus na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bzhir brtag ces pa sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i dus na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bzhir brtag ces pa sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
translated: At the time of the approach, one should examine the master's qualifications in four ways: He should have the four bodies.

original: brgyud pa dang ldan zhes pa chos skur gnas pa'o //
analyzed: brgyud pa dang ldan zhes pa chos skur gnas pa'o //
translated: He should have the lineage, abiding in the dharmakāya.

original: dam tshig ces pa bde ba chen po'i skur gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces pa bde ba chen po'i skur gnas pa'o //
translated: He should have the commitments, abiding in the body of great bliss.

original: rgyud sde zhes pa longs skur gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud sde zhes pa longs skur gnas pa'o //
translated: He should have the tantras, abiding in the sambhogakāya.

original: gzhan don zhes pa sprul skur ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan don zhes pa sprul skur ston pa'o //
translated: He should have the benefit for others, manifesting in the nirmāṇakāya.

original: zhu 'bul zhes pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhu 'bul zhes pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: He should make the request, generating the supreme mind of enlightenment.

original: 'og min du longs sku la zhu ba phul ba bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i snang ba de rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras btsas nas khrus gsol ba na bla me tog ces pa ni chos sku bde ba chen po las ma g-yos par sprul sku ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'og min du longs sku la zhu ba phul ba bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i snang ba de rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras btsas nas khrus gsol ba na bla me tog ces pa ni chos sku bde ba chen po las ma g-yos par sprul sku ston pa'o //
translated: The request to the sambhogakāya in Akaniṣṭha is the appearance of the empowerment conferral of the vase. When the son of King Śuddhodana was born and given a bath, the guru was called Puṣpa. He is the manifestation of the nirmāṇakāya without moving from the dharmakāya of great bliss.

original: rdzas byams pa'i stobs phan chad kyis bsags te spos kyi glang po la sogs pa skor mang ba la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos skyong thams cad kyis mchod nas 'dzam bu'i gling du lung bstan pa de phyi'i mchod pa'o //🔽yab yum gyi @155a * //
analyzed: rdzas byams pa'i stobs phan chad kyis bsags te spos kyi glang po la sogs pa skor mang ba la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos skyong thams cad kyis mchod nas 'dzam bu'i gling du lung bstan pa de phyi'i mchod pa'o // yab yum gyi @155a * //
translated: The outer offering is the offering made by the bodhisattvas and all the Dharma protectors of the ten directions to the Buddha after he had accumulated the power of loving-kindness and material generosity, as in the case of the bodhisattva Hastipadopama.

original: gnas su bcas nas yi ge lnga las mngon byang lngar nyams su myong ba de nang mchod do //
analyzed: gnas su bcas nas yi ge lnga las mngon byang lngar nyams su myong ba de nang mchod do //
translated: The inner offering is the experience of the five manifest enlightenments from the five seed syllables in the places of the father and mother.

original: de'i dus na yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de de kho na'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dus na yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de de kho na'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The offering of suchness is the one who resides in the womb of the mother at that time.

original: yab yum gyi skor spos kyi glang po la sogs par snang ba de chos skyong la gtor ma ster ba'o //
analyzed: yab yum gyi skor spos kyi glang po la sogs par snang ba de chos skyong la gtor ma ster ba'o //
translated: The offering to the Dharma protectors is the appearance of the father and mother as the retinue of Hastipadopama and so on.

original: rigs bzhi la nor zas kyi spyin pa gtong bar snang ba de slob ma yongs su skyob pa yin la /
analyzed: rigs bzhi la nor zas kyi spyin pa gtong bar snang ba de slob ma yongs su skyob pa yin la /
translated: The protection of the disciples is the appearance of the giving of wealth and food to the four castes.

original: dmangs la nye ring med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu spyod par snang ba de dang gzhan rjes su smon pa de gnyis ka slob dpon las sdom pa len pa'o //
analyzed: dmangs la nye ring med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu spyod par snang ba de dang gzhan rjes su smon pa de gnyis ka slob dpon las sdom pa len pa'o //
translated: The two, the appearance of conduct in the six perfections without partiality toward the people and the aspiration for the benefit of others, are the vows taken from the master.

original: sku skyo nas grong khyer du 'chag pa la skye rga la sogs pa'i snang ba mthong ba la de 'khor ba la yi mug par ston pa de so so thar pa'i bslab pa srung ba'o //
analyzed: sku skyo nas grong khyer du 'chag pa la skye rga la sogs pa'i snang ba mthong ba la de 'khor ba la yi mug par ston pa de so so thar pa'i bslab pa srung ba'o //
translated: The appearance of seeing the phenomena of birth, aging, and so on when the body is tired and one walks in the city is the protection of the pratimoksha vows.

original: de'i dus su rgyal bu ming sring phan chad spyin pa byas pa'i snang ba de theg pa chen po'i sdom pa srung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dus su rgyal bu ming sring phan chad spyin pa byas pa'i snang ba de theg pa chen po'i sdom pa srung ba'o //
translated: The appearance of giving to the prince and princess at that time is the protection of the Mahayana vows.

original: yum las bltams par snang ba de mkha' gsang bying gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: yum las bltams par snang ba de mkha' gsang bying gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The appearance of being born from the mother is the consecration of the secret place.

original: rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs che bas bstod pa'i snang ba de rgyu gang bsnyen gyi sngags zlo ba'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs che bas bstod pa'i snang ba de rgyu gang bsnyen gyi sngags zlo ba'o //
translated: The appearance of praise by the great royal and brahmin families is the recitation of the mantra of the cause approach.

original: rdzas kyi bye brag lam chags pa'i snang ba de /
analyzed: rdzas kyi bye brag lam chags pa'i snang ba de /
translated: The appearance of the accumulation of various substances

original: dpa' bo dga' ston byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo dga' ston byed pa'o //
translated: is the hero's feast.

original: de nas khyim spong zhes yab yum la zhu ba'i snang ba de sangs rgyas 'das pa la zhu ba'o //
analyzed: de nas khyim spong zhes yab yum la zhu ba'i snang ba de sangs rgyas 'das pa la zhu ba'o //
translated: Then, the appearance of requesting the parents to leave the home is requesting the deceased Buddha.

original: mndal gong ltar ro //
analyzed: mndal gong ltar ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is as above.

original: longs sku la zhu ba'i snang ba de slob dpon /
analyzed: longs sku la zhu ba'i snang ba de slob dpon /
translated: The appearance of requesting the saṃbhogakāya is the master.

original: shes pa la zhu ba de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: shes pa la zhu ba de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: The appearance of requesting the mind is the deceased Buddha.

original: brgyud pa zhes pa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de yang sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: brgyud pa zhes pa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de yang sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The “lineage” is the deceased Buddha endowed with the four kāyas.

original: der rgyal srid gzung pa'i snang ba de rdzas kyis lha bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: der rgyal srid gzung pa'i snang ba de rdzas kyis lha bsnyen pa'o //
translated: The appearance of holding the kingdom there is the approach of the deity with substances.

original: rgyal po chen po bzhis bteg pa'i snang ba de rnal 'byor bzhis lha bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po bzhis bteg pa'i snang ba de rnal 'byor bzhis lha bsnyen pa'o //
translated: The appearance of being lifted by the four great kings is the approach of the deity with the four yogas.

original: dpal lha las babs pa'i rtser phyin pa'i snang ba de chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: dpal lha las babs pa'i rtser phyin pa'i snang ba de chos skyong bsnyen pa'o //
translated: The appearance of arriving at the peak of the descent of the glorious deity is the approach of the dharmapālas.

original: mchod rten la mkhan po byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid las med la /
analyzed: mchod rten la mkhan po byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid las med la /
translated: The appearance of being the preceptor of the caitya and the Bhagavān himself is the approach of the deity with the four powers.
